nodes.text: Collin Praji was a Human member of the Coruscanti House Praji who lived before the end of the Galactic Republic. Praji was born on the planet Coruscant and enrolled for military service, unlike many members of the Praji family, who took to lives as dandies and functionaries. Eventually, Praji attained the rank of Colonel. The Kalandar Installation, located on the planet Talus, was rechristened Fort Praji in Praji's honor.
In 104 ABY, the historian Dr. Gabrel Treon mentioned Praji in an article he wrote about the House Praji family, Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Praji: A Cartel of Genes.

Collin Praji was first mentioned in Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Praji, a Hyperspace-exclusive in-universe history article written by Nathan O'Keefe and published on February 5, 2009. The source did not specify Praji's gender.
